author: Jay Peters
title: A Snapchat-owned location app just added a leaderboard comparing who stays home the most
description: Zenly, a Snapchat-owned location-sharing app, has created a way to gamify social distancing with a new leaderboard comparing how much your friends stay home.
content:
Zenly is gamifying social distancing
Image: Zenly
A Snapchat-owned location-sharing app has created a way to gamify social distancing with a leaderboard comparing who among your friends spends the most time at home (via TechCrunch).
The app, Zenly, typical… [+1420 chars]
